titles.title: A bill to require the National Incident Based Reporting System, the Uniform Crime Reporting Program, and the Law Enforcement National Data Exchange Program to list cruelty to animals as a separate offense category.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S15064)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
12/10/2007--Introduced.
Requires the Attorney General to modify the National Incident Based Reporting System, the Uniform Crime Reporting Program, and the Law Enforcement National Data Exchange Program to list cruelty to animals as a separate offense category.
